2057.verse: And if you [must] turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word.

2058.verse: And do not make your hand [as] chained to your neck or extend it completely and [thereby] become blamed and insolvent.

2059.verse: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.

2060.verse: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin.

2061.verse: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.

2062.verse: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. And whoever is killed unjustly - We have given his heir authority, but let him not exceed limits in [the matter of] taking life. Indeed, he has been supported [by the law].

2063.verse: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity. And fulfill [every] commitment. Indeed, the commitment is ever [that about which one will be] questioned.

2064.verse: And give full measure when you measure, and weigh with an even balance. That is the best [way] and best in result.

2065.verse: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge. Indeed, the hearing, the sight and the heart - about all those [one] will be questioned.

2066.verse: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height.

2067.verse: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested.
